text: Yakuonaonape, kwaliji kwana kukwenu chimanyilo (cha chikulupusyo cha Allah) mâ€™mikutula jiwili jajasimangene (pa ngondo ja Badri), nkutula wine waputaga ngondo petala lya Allah sano wineo waliji wachikafili, (makafiligo) galiji nkwaona (Asilamuo kuti ali wajinji) pakulandanya ni muwawelele wanganyao winji wakawili pa kulola kwameso (kutendaga nambo Asilamuo ali wapanandi). Sano Allah akun'dimbanganyaga ni chikulupusyo Chakwe jwansachile, chisimu mu yalakweyo mwana kuchetelela kusyene kwa wakwete meso (gakulolechesya mwa umanyilisi)
